content: ***hi you ll be able to see the full free pattern when you scroll down the blog post through the link provided there is also an ad-free printable version for purchase thank you *** carry your necessities and more in this gorgeous oversized knit bag featuring a slouchy design and wide straps it s both comfortable and practical playful tassels add fun and flair to your new fave knit tote this bag is made by first knitting a rectangular base next you will pick up stitches around the base and proceed to knit in the round stitches are then split to work the shaping at the top and then again at the handles the entire bag is knit while holding two strands of yarn together skill level intermediate materials us size 11 8 0 mm 16 circular knitting needles 3 lion brand yarn re-tweed in hay 100 g/skein grab the kit available in several color options here 2 lion brand yarn re-tweed in peanut butter 100g/skein pattern uses approximately 330 g of yarn scissors tapestry needle sizes/dimensions approximate 17 wide x 18 tall when laid flat abbreviations & skills k knit p purl k2tog knit two together decrease cc change color hope you enjoy the bag
